mapper.insert: insert into salary_sheet (id, staff_id, staff_name, company_bank_account_id, raw_salary, tax, actual_salary, state, create_time) values (#{id}, #{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{companyBankAccountId}, #{rawSalary}, #{tax}, #{actualSalary}, #{state}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update salary_sheet set state = #{state} where id = #{salarySheetId}
update salary_sheet set state = #{state} where id = #{salarySheetId} and state = #{prevState}
mapper.select: select * from salary_sheet where staff_id = #{employeeId} and MONTH(create_time) = MONTH(#{date}) and YEAR(create_time) = YEAR(#{date})
select * from salary_sheet where staff_id = #{employeeId} order by create_time desc limit 0, 1
select * from salary_sheet where state = '审批完成' and staff_id = #{staffId} and YEAR(create_time) = #{year} and MONTH(create_time) = #{month}
